sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { position } from '../Controllers/utils' const OneOffer = () => { const [infos,setInfos]=useState( { title:"", picture:"", postDate:"", expireDate:"", field:"", description:"", position:"", time:"", presence:"", numDemands:0, companyName:"" } ) return (

{infos.companyName}

Posted : {infos.postDate}

{infos.title}

Field : {infos.field}

Presence : {infos.presence}

Position : {infos.position}

Full-time / Part-time : {infos.field}

{infos.description}

) } export default OneOffer
